column5: Well, this is Fouzen...&Looks like a complicated layout.
column6: Bene, questo > Fouzen...&Sembra un layout complicato.

column5: Let's move carefully here.&We don't want to be spotted.
column6: Qui procediamo con cautela.&Non vogliamo essere individuati.

column5: Be careful! If they get those searchlights on you,&you'll be dodging mortars.
column6: Stai attento! Se ti beccano i riflettori,&dovrai schivare i mortai.

column5: Be careful! If they get those searchlights on you,&you'll be dodging mortars.
column6: Stai attento! Se ti beccano i riflettori,&dovrai schivare i mortai.

column5: Avoid the lights at all cost.&If they find you, take evasive action immediately!
column6: Evitate i riflettori a ogni costo.&Se vi trovano, agite subito per evitarli!

column5: Avoid the lights at all cost.&If they find you, take evasive action immediately!
column6: Evitate i riflettori a ogni costo.&Se vi trovano, agite subito per evitarli!

column5: Lieutenant Gunther, you may be able to move&unseen using the trolley cars around town.
column6: Tenente Gunther, forse puoi muoverti&non visto usando i tram della citt=.

column5: Lieutenant Gunther, you may be able to move&unseen using the trolley cars around town.
column6: Tenente Gunther, forse puoi muoverti&non visto usando i tram della citt=.

column5: Their path is fixed and they can only fit one person,&but they may get you behind the enemy.
column6: Il percorso > fisso, entra una sola persona,&ma potresti arrivare alle spalle dei nemici.
